title: Richmond Loop developer behind major construction projects in Lower Mainland

excerpt: The property development company that purchased three lots near the intersection of Richmond Loop and Highway 16 in Burns Lake has worked on several major property developments in the Vancouver area.
content_html: The property development company that purchased three lots near the intersection of Richmond Loop and Highway 16 in Burns Lake has worked on several major property developments in the Vancouver area. Northstar Development purchased the three lots from the Village of Burns Lake this year. It’s not clear yet what will be built on the lots, with Northstar Development saying that a project is in early planning stages and will be announced soon. However, Northstar Development has a track record of developing major commercial and residential properties, according to their website.
